Our Atlassian technical expertise is unparalleled and we support our customers across the entire spectrum of their projects on those platforms. As a recognized Specialized Partner, we help organizations accelerate time to value with Agile at scale, Cloud, and ITSM implementations. Because teamwork requires more than just tools, we help bridge the gap between applications and strategic practices such as SAFeÂ® and ITIL. Over the last 15 years, we have helped more than 5,000 customers achieve their desired business outcomes at a reduced time to value, through improved team collaboration. At Valiantys we talk straight, we share and take part, we are mindful of what matters, we make every interaction remarkable and we never stand still. If you think the 5 values sound familiar to you, we bet you will love working with us!  Your assignment  We are looking for a final year intern to join the Valiantys Operational Excellence team. As a Data Analyst Assistant within our team, you will play a key role in the implementation and optimisation of Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) using our Data Visualisation platform: Tableau. You will work closely with our Operational Excellence team to strengthen our data-driven decision-making processes. Things you'll be working on Develop Reports : - Create comprehensive reports and dashboards using Business Intelligence (BI) tools.  These reports should effectively communicate key metrics and findings to stakeholders, assisting in strategic decision-making processes. Collaborate with Teams : - Work closely with cross-functional teams, especially the Operational Excellence team, to understand their data needs. - Provide analytical support to help these teams optimize their processes and outcomes. Maintain Data Integrity : - Ensure the accuracy and consistency of data across various sources.  - Regularly review and clean data to maintain the integrity of the information used for analysis. Present Findings : - Clearly communicate complex data insights to a non-technical audience. - This includes preparing and delivering presentations that articulate the significance of data-driven decisions to the overall business strategy. Do you have what it takes to be a Data Analyst Assistant ? You have a 5-year IT/Data Science degree and have worked with data as part of an internship or project.  You must be fluent in French & English. You have a solid knowledge on software development and you know how to script (Python, Bash, etc.). You know how to manipulate databases (SQL). If You've already worked on Dataviz projects it would be great ! You are also :  - comfortable communicating with different types of people on both business and technical issues. - Curious to learn and develop your skills in Dataviz-related subjects. - Good interpersonal skills - Ability to listen and teach - A sense of service If you have a knowledge of Atlassian and/or Tableau tools would be highly appreciated. Why are we the company you need? Our team members are our greatest asset and we work hard to ensure that Valiantys is not only a great place to work, but also a platform for you to grow. Sense . We're committed to giving you the level of information you need to make sense of your assignments. You will witness the impact of your actions. Training . We will provide you with the necessary time and budget to help you develop your skills and maintain your employability in the job market. Flexibility . We understand that life is all about balance and we offer you the flexibility and support to help you maintain balance across the different pillars of your life. In addition, our advantages: - An international environment and a multicultural team - A real telework program - Generous meal vouchers - The choice between PC or Mac - A spacious convivial space, a functional kitchen and fresh fruit because your health is important to us! Follow us on   LinkedIn ,  Twitter ,  Instagram  and  Youtube
